title: 265: Katie’s Bachelorette Premiere! (Limo Entrances + Chris Harrison Fired + Hot Takes on Greg)
itunes:title: 265: Katie’s Bachelorette Premiere! (Limo Entrances + Chris Harrison Fired + Hot Takes on Greg)
description:
It’s that time, Broads! Bekah and Jess excitedly recap Bachelorette Katie’s night 1! They chat about initial thoughts on Katie, hosts Tayshia and Kaitlyn, their favorites and least favorites so far, all the swoon and all the cringe, Andrew S’s continued British accent, Justin the painter, cat makeouts with Connor B, simping for some reason over Christian, theories on Aaron and Cody’s confrontation, strong opinions about Bach Nation’s new fave and first impression rose winner Greg, and a lot more! And of course, they cover the departure/firing of Chris Harrison!

***Join The Broads Thursday for a non-Bach episode and The Bros Friday for their recap of Katie’s Night 1!

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***GREEN CHEF: Go to GREENCHEF.COM/90CHATTY and use code 90CHATTY to get $90 off including free shipping!

***PRETTY LITTER: Go to PRETTYLITER.COM and use promo code CHATTY for 20% off your first order!

***THIRDLOVE: Go to THIRDLOVE.COM/CHATTY now to get 20% off your first purchase

***CARE/OF:  For 50% off your first Care/of order, go to TAKECAREOF.COM and enter code CHATTY50

***BABBEL: When you purchase a 3-month Babble subscription, you’ll get an additional 3 months for FREE at BABBEL.COM and using promo code CHATTY

 

FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/

Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/

Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ
